header.title: Office - Free of charge for our students | SÃ¡mi University of Applied Sciences

body.p: Office - Free of charge for our students

For students free of charge The students at SUAS get the Office package for free. Both for Windows and Mac, at this page: http://samas.onthehub.com Discount for employees SUAS employees get the same Office package to lower price. Costs only 9.25 Euro.
Upgrade possibilities If you already got Office licence, it is possible to upgrade your Office pack.

list.p: Students: First of all you need a login-user to get to the page http://samas.onthehub.com . To get one you send your name, e-mail and student number to support .
